description: A two stage multi that will start youin the historical town centre (Historischer Stadtkern) of Otterberg.The abovecoordinates will place you in front of the Abteikirche (Abby Church) which dates its beginningsback to the 11th Century. There are many historical buildingslocated within easy walking distance of the Abteikirche. I highlyrecommend spending a bit of time to see them. To help you locatethem, the above coordinates will place you beside an informationboard with the recommended tour (Empfohlener Rundgang). There arealso plenty of places to enjoy a nice meal or a drink! How aboutthe historical Blaues Haus (1612)?You will also need the information from the recommended tour todetermine the coordinates for the next stage.Each stop of the tour is numbered. To determine the coordinates youwill need the year(s) next to the tour number and place. (i.e. #2is Abteikirche 1168 – 1254).#3 XXXX = A#7 XXXX = B#19 XXXX = C#24 XXXX = DNow for some math:((A + B)/6) + 13 = EC – D + 17 = FNow you can head to stage two at:N 49° 29.EE 007° 47.FWalking is possible, but I would recommend taking a car or bike.(you can park at the determined coordinates).At stage two, you are fairly close to the final cache.Now proceed on:a bearing of 165° (True) for a distance of115 meters.Recommend you take the hint with you to decode in-case ofneed.If you have problems finding the cache using projected waypoints,then send me a message after you have finished stage one (includethe coordinates that you determined) and I’ll give you a hinton how to determine the final coordinates from your computer. Thefinal cache is a Rubbermaid container. Please be sure the cache iswell hidden when you are done!© DcCow, Opencaching.de, CC BY-NC-ND, Stand: 07.05.2018;alle Logeinträge © jeweiliger Autor
name: Abteikirche Otterberg von DcCow

logs.message: Der letzte Fund für den Tag.Hier war ich schon einmal im Dezember, aber eine bühne hatte den Zugang zu Stage 1 versperrt.heute war hier nichts los und die werte schnell .mit dem auto ging es dann zum Finale.Danke für den Multi!Lg Barfly* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *### [Geocaching Donnersberg ORBIT](https:

(Gefunden als #258 am 15.03.2012, 17:30 Uhr)Na ja, mal wieder ein bisschen gerechnet an einem altbekannten, wunderbaren Gebäude und dann ganz woanders eine Dose  (die übrigens offen herumlag).Gruß, Matthias

Found this cache loing before it was listet on opencaching:Very nice church and a beautiful final location, found everything quickly and without problems, signed the log at 16.25.in : TB "Geburtstagsmäuschen", Personal GC of grodan & fiabus, Spongebob-Figur, Schlüsselringout : TB "Die 2 Schwäne von Ulm", Zodiac Geocoin, Ü-Ei-Figürchen, PinTFTC, Greets from Kaiserslautern,Faust 64# 715
Again we found a cache in a place which we know from our non-caching-but-strolling-through-the-forest-times...many thanks for the tour!In: TBOut: -
